item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, October 21, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. An amateur historian has discovered a long-lost short story by Bram Stoker (123 points | 62 comments)
2. Show HN: Epublifier – scrape pages (books, manuals) for offline reading (190 points | 32 comments)
3. IOCCC Flight Simulator (2010) (113 points | 16 comments)
4. Morsle – A daily Morse code challenge (53 points | 18 comments)
5. Waking up science's sleeping beauties (2023) (38 points | 11 comments)
6. Egypt declared malaria-free after 100-year effort (321 points | 31 comments)
7. Scientists working to decode birdsong (90 points | 89 comments)
8. ByteDance intern fired for planting malicious code in AI models (15 points | 4 comments)
9. U.S. Border Surveillance Towers Have Always Been Broken (57 points | 26 comments)
10. Plankton balloon to six times size in newly discovered mode of oceanic travel (52 points | 5 comments)
11. Can SpaceX land a rocket with 1/2 cm accuracy? (95 points | 78 comments)
12. Perplexity AI's new tool makes researching the stock market 'delightful' (11 points | 2 comments)
13. Wild animals are spiraling to extinction. Can a bunch of bureaucrats save them? (56 points | 33 comments)
14. Jiga (YC W21) Is Hiring a Full Stack Engineer (React/Mongo/Node) ( | hide)
15. Once You Try a Four-Day Workweek, It's Hard to Go Back (18 points | 14 comments)
16. Show HN: HN Update – Hourly news broadcast of top HN stories (558 points | 166 comments)
17. "The Secret History of the Mongols": A digital history approach (30 points | 9 comments)
18. A step toward fully 3D-printed active electronics (168 points | 69 comments)
19. Robot vacuum cleaners hacked to spy on, insult owners (13 points | 3 comments)
20. Turning the Crank: Design as a Mechanical Process (17 points | 1 comment)
21. Do AI detectors work? Students face false cheating accusations (356 points | 778 comments)
22. WebGPU-Based WiFi Simulator (311 points | 81 comments)
23. Making Castro’s Feeds Update Faster the Lazy Way (74 points | 24 comments)
24. Kurt Vonnegut's lost board game published (311 points | 88 comments)
25. Turing and the Primes (2016) [pdf] (6 points | 1 comment)
26. Werckmeister Temperment (9 points | 4 comments)
27. Brain endurance training improves older adults' cognitive, physical performance (64 points | 17 comments)
28. Drasi: Microsoft's open source data processing platform for event-driven systems (308 points | 54 comments)
29. Show HN: Semantic Macros Text Editor (33 points | 8 comments)
30. Ask HN: How to learn UI/UX as a data/BE engineer? (18 points | 14 comments)
